verses.verse: The <S%G3778>same<s%> <S%G2064>came<s%> <S%G1519>for<s%> a <S%G3141>witness<s%>, <S%G2443>to<s%> bear <S%G3140>witness<s%> <S%G4012>of<s%> the <S%G5457>Light<s%>, <S%G2443>that<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> men <S%G1223>through<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> might <S%G4100>believe<s%>.

<S%G1161>But<s%> as many <S%G3745>as<s%> <S%G2983>received<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>, to <S%G846>them<s%> gave <S%G1325>he<s%> <S%G1849>power<s%> to <S%G1096>become<s%> the <S%G5043>sons<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%>, even to them that <S%G4100>believe<s%> <S%G1519>on<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G3686>name<s%>:

<S%G3739>Which<s%> were <S%G1080>born<s%>, <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G129>blood<s%>, <S%G3761>nor<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> the <S%G2307>will<s%> of the <S%G4561>flesh<s%>, <S%G3761>nor<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> the <S%G2307>will<s%> of <S%G435>man<s%>, <S%G235>but<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> the <S%G3056>Word<s%> was <S%G1096>made<s%> <S%G4561>flesh<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4637>dwelt<s%> <S%G1722>among<s%> <S%G2254>us<s%>, <S%G2532>(and<s%> we <S%G2300>beheld<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G1391>glory<s%>, the <S%G1391>glory<s%> <S%G5613>as<s%> of the only <S%G3439>begotten<s%> <S%G3844>of<s%> the <S%G3962>Father<s%>,) <S%G4134>full<s%> of <S%G5485>grace<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G225>truth<s%>.

¶ <S%G2491>John<s%> bare <S%G3140>witness<s%> <S%G4012>of<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2896>cried<s%>, <S%G3004>saying<s%>, <S%G3778>This<s%> was <S%G2258>he<s%> of <S%G3739>whom<s%> I <S%G2036>spake<s%>, He that <S%G2064>cometh<s%> <S%G3694>after<s%> <S%G3450>me<s%> is <S%G1096>preferred<s%> <S%G1715>before<s%> <S%G3450>me<s%>: <S%G3754>for<s%> he <S%G2258>was<s%> <S%G4413>before<s%> <S%G3450>me<s%>.

No <S%G3762>man<s%> hath <S%G3708>seen<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> at any <S%G4455>time<s%>; the only <S%G3439>begotten<s%> <S%G5207>Son<s%>, <S%G3588>which<s%> <S%G5607>is<s%> <S%G1519>in<s%> the <S%G2859>bosom<s%> of the <S%G3962>Father<s%>, <S%G1565>he<s%> hath <S%G1834>declared<s%> him.

<S%G3767>Then<s%> said <S%G2036>they<s%> unto <S%G846>him<s%>, <S%G5101>Who<s%> art <S%G1488>thou<s%>? <S%G2443>that<s%> we may <S%G1325>give<s%> an <S%G612>answer<s%> to them that <S%G3992>sent<s%> <S%G2248>us<s%>. <S%G5101>What<s%> sayest <S%G3004>thou<s%> <S%G4012>of<s%> <S%G4572>thyself<s%>?

He <S%G5346>said<s%>, <S%G1473>I<s%> am the <S%G5456>voice<s%> of one <S%G994>crying<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G2048>wilderness<s%>, Make <S%G2116>straight<s%> the <S%G3598>way<s%> of the <S%G2962>Lord<s%>, <S%G2531>as<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> the <S%G4396>prophet<s%> <S%G2268>Esaias<s%>.

¶ The next <S%G1887>day<s%> <S%G2491>John<s%> <S%G991>seeth<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G2064>coming<s%> <S%G4314>unto<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3004>saith<s%>, <S%G2396>Behold<s%> the <S%G286>Lamb<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%>, <S%G3588>which<s%> taketh <S%G142>away<s%> the <S%G266>sin<s%> of the <S%G2889>world<s%>.

And <S%G2504>I<s%> <S%G1492>knew<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%>: <S%G235>but<s%> <S%G2443>that<s%> he should be made <S%G5319>manifest<s%> to <S%G2474>Israel<s%>, <S%G1223%G5124>therefore<s%> <S%G2064>am<s%> <S%G1473>I<s%> <S%G2064>come<s%> <S%G907>baptizing<s%> <S%G1722>with<s%> <S%G5204>water<s%>.

And <S%G2504>I<s%> <S%G1492>knew<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%>: <S%G235>but<s%> he that <S%G3992>sent<s%> <S%G3165>me<s%> to <S%G907>baptize<s%> <S%G1722>with<s%> <S%G5204>water<s%>, the <S%G1565>same<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> unto <S%G3427>me<s%>, <S%G1909>Upon<s%> <S%G3739%G302>whom<s%> thou shalt <S%G1492>see<s%> the <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> <S%G2597>descending<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3306>remaining<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>, the <S%G3778>same<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> he which <S%G907>baptizeth<s%> <S%G1722>with<s%> the <S%G40>Holy<s%> <S%G4151>Ghost<s%>.
<S%G2532>And<s%> looking <S%G1689>upon<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> as he <S%G4043>walked<s%>, he <S%G3004>saith<s%>, <S%G2396>Behold<s%> the <S%G286>Lamb<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%>!

<S%G1161>Then<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G4762>turned<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2300>saw<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> <S%G190>following<s%>, and <S%G3004>saith<s%> unto <S%G846>them<s%>, What <S%G5101><s%> seek ye <S%G2212%G1161><s%> ? They <S%G2036>said<s%> unto <S%G846>him<s%>, <S%G4461>Rabbi<s%>, <S%G3739>(which<s%> is to <S%G3004>say<s%>, being <S%G2059>interpreted<s%>, <S%G1320>Master<s%>,) <S%G4226>where<s%> dwellest <S%G3306>thou<s%>?

He <S%G3004>saith<s%> unto <S%G846>them<s%>, Come <S%G2064><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> see <S%G1492><s%> . They <S%G2064>came<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1492>saw<s%> <S%G4226>where<s%> he <S%G3306>dwelt<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3306>abode<s%> <S%G3844>with<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G1565>that<s%> <S%G2250>day<s%>: <S%G1161>for<s%> it <S%G2258>was<s%> <S%G5613>about<s%> the <S%G1182>tenth<s%> <S%G5610>hour<s%>.

<S%G3778>He<s%> <S%G4413>first<s%> <S%G2147>findeth<s%> his <S%G2398>own<s%> <S%G80>brother<s%> <S%G4613>Simon<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3004>saith<s%> unto <S%G846>him<s%>, We have <S%G2147>found<s%> the <S%G3323>Messias<s%>, <S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%>, being <S%G3177>interpreted<s%>, the <S%G5547>Christ<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> he <S%G71>brought<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G4314>to<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%>. <S%G1161>And<s%> when <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G1689>beheld<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>, he <S%G2036>said<s%>, Thou <S%G4771><s%> art <S%G1488><s%> Simon <S%G4613><s%> the son <S%G5207><s%> of Jona <S%G2495><s%> : thou <S%G4771><s%> shalt be called <S%G2564><s%> Cephas <S%G2786><s%> , <S%G3739>which<s%> is by <S%G2059>interpretation<s%>, A <S%G4074>stone<s%>.

¶ The day <S%G1887>following<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G2309>would<s%> go <S%G1831>forth<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G1056>Galilee<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2147>findeth<s%> <S%G5376>Philip<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3004>saith<s%> unto <S%G846>him<s%>, Follow <S%G190><s%> me <S%G3427><s%> .

<S%G5376>Philip<s%> <S%G2147>findeth<s%> <S%G3482>Nathanael<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3004>saith<s%> unto <S%G846>him<s%>, We have <S%G2147>found<s%> him, of <S%G3739>whom<s%> <S%G3475>Moses<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G3551>law<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G4396>prophets<s%>, did <S%G1125>write<s%>, <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G575>of<s%> <S%G3478>Nazareth<s%>, the <S%G5207>son<s%> of <S%G2501>Joseph<s%>.

<S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G1492>saw<s%> <S%G3482>Nathanael<s%> <S%G2064>coming<s%> <S%G4314>to<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3004>saith<s%> <S%G4012>of<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>, Behold <S%G2396><s%> an Israelite <S%G2475><s%> indeed <S%G230><s%> , in <S%G1722><s%> whom <S%G3739><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> no <S%G3756><s%> guile <S%G1388><s%> !

<S%G3482>Nathanael<s%> <S%G3004>saith<s%> unto <S%G846>him<s%>, <S%G4159>Whence<s%> knowest <S%G1097>thou<s%> <S%G3165>me<s%>? <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G611>answered<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> unto <S%G846>him<s%>, Before <S%G4253><s%> that Philip <S%G5376><s%> called <S%G5455><s%> thee <S%G4571><s%> , when thou wast <S%G5607><s%> under <S%G5259><s%> the fig tree <S%G4808><s%> , I saw <S%G1492><s%> thee <S%G4571><s%> .

<S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G611>answered<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> unto <S%G846>him<s%>, Because <S%G3754><s%> I said <S%G2036><s%> unto thee <S%G4671><s%> , I saw <S%G1492><s%> thee <S%G4571><s%> under <S%G5270><s%> the fig tree <S%G4808><s%> , believest thou <S%G4100><s%> ? thou shalt see <S%G3700><s%> greater things <S%G3187><s%> than these <S%G5130><s%> .

<S%G2532>And<s%> he <S%G3004>saith<s%> unto <S%G846>him<s%>, Verily <S%G281><s%> , verily <S%G281><s%> , I say <S%G3004><s%> unto you <S%G5213><s%> , Hereafter <S%G737%G575><s%> ye shall see <S%G3700><s%> heaven <S%G3772><s%> open <S%G455><s%> , and <S%G2532><s%> the angels <S%G32><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> ascending <S%G305><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> descending <S%G2597><s%> upon <S%G1909><s%> the Son <S%G5207><s%> of man <S%G444><s%> .
